info.description:
Purpose

ModelBuilder was created to be a generic interface to people that need to
simulated Ordinary Differential Equations (ODE) models and analyze their output.

For that purpose I wrote a (hopefully) nice frontend to the LSODA ODE solving
library, so that the model equations can be written directly in the main window
and the parameters for the numerical integration can also be set easily.

Features

The system of ODEs can be solved for the specified number of time steps, from
the initial values, by pressing the run button.

Since most user need to assess uncertainties assocciated to to model components
(variables). I added an uncertainty analysis module, which allows for a
state-of-the-art Bayesian inference on the model components.
info.keywords: matehematical modelling, ODE, Differential equations, Bayesian inference, Bayesian melding, Uncertainty analysis
info.name: ModelBuilder
info.html_description:
Purpose

ModelBuilder was created to be a generic interface to people that need to simulated Ordinary Differential Equations (ODE) models and analyze their output.

For that purpose I wrote a (hopefully) nice frontend to the LSODA ODE solving library, so that the model equations can be written directly in the main window and the parameters for the numerical integration can also be set easily.

Features

The system of ODEs can be solved for the specified number of time steps, from the initial values, by pressing the run button.

Since most user need to assess uncertainties assocciated to to model components (variables). I added an uncertainty analysis module, which allows for a state-of-the-art Bayesian inference on the model components.
